snippet: Left-handed pitcher Johan Santana allowed eight runs in one and a third innings in his return from three weeks on the disabled list. The Mets’ loss at Citi Field was its sixth in eight games.
abstract: Atlanta Braves defeat the New York Mets, 9-3.
lead_paragraph: Left-handed pitcher Johan Santana allowed eight runs in one and a third innings in his return from three weeks on the disabled list. The Mets’ loss at Citi Field was its sixth in eight games.

headline.seo: Braves Shell Mets as Johan Santana Makes Early Exit
headline.main: About as Bad as It Gets for Santana in His Return
headline.print_headline: About as Bad as It Gets for Santana in His Return
